name: com.idaocracy.naninovelsceneassistant
description:
Various utility tools for Naninovel:

Scene assistant: Transform Naninovel objects in real time and easily copy over their values over to scenario scripts. 
Custom variable debug menu: Track custom variable values and change them on the go. Includes the option to search and filter by variable name.
Unlockable debug menu: Track custom variable values and change them on the go. Includes the option to search and filter by unlockable name.
Scripts debug menu: Preload and play scripts with the click of a button. Includes the option to search and filter by name.
